sections.summary: retired information assurance systems security certification specialist responsible for managing and monitoring information systems and network security, and information systems security programs in support of the information security/information assurance mission for u.s. army medical command and defense health agency. also, served as a clerk typist and secretary. highlights self-directed strong interpersonal skills results-oriented dedicated team player time management labor relations accomplishments increased office organization by developing more efficient filing system and customer database protocols.
